List, extract taxa

Source: R/rainbio.R
query_taxa.Rd

Provide list of selected taxa

Usage

query_taxa(
  class = c("Magnoliopsida", "Pinopsida", "Lycopsida", "Pteropsida"),
  family = NULL,
  genus = NULL,
  order = NULL,
  species = NULL,
  only_species = TRUE,
  only_genus = FALSE,
  only_family = FALSE,
  only_class = FALSE,
  ids = NULL,
  verbose = TRUE,
  exact_match = FALSE,
  check_syn = TRUE,
  extract_known_syn = FALSE,
  nbr_fuzz = 1
)

Arguments

class

character string of class

family

string

genus

string

order

string

species

string genus followed by species name separated by one space

only_species

logical

only_genus

logical

only_family

logical

only_class

logical

ids

integer id of searched taxa

verbose

logical

exact_match

logical

check_syn

logical

extract_known_syn

logical

nbr_fuzz

number of entries to return when fuzzy search

Value

A tibble of all taxa

A tibble of plots or individuals if extract_individuals is TRUE

Author

Gilles Dauby, gilles.dauby@ird.fr
